On This Page

    About This Project

    Here is a site for a clothing retailer that has product filtering in the catalog and a static menu that can be browsed from any page. These tools are built into the theme itself, and it supports custom swatches from a color or image.

    Product categories can be created from tags or important details like the manufacturer, and those pages will be added to the menu. This site also has a review app installed and can display allowed reviews on the product pages.
